  "title": "Female Production Assistant",
  "description": "We are looking for a detailed oriented Female Production Assistant

Responsibilities


	Support the production team in daily operations
	Assist in setting up equipment and other production materials
	Monitor production timelines to ensure orders are completed on schedule.
	Assist in packaging and labelling


Requirements


	Bsc / OND qualification.
	2 years relevant work experience
	Candidate must reside in or around Gbagada
	Excellent communication and teamwork skill
	Detail-oriented with excellent time management and organizational abilities.
	Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.
",

Female Production Assistant job at FumQuench Parfaithub




        
    

        
        We are looking for a detailed oriented Female Production Assistant

Responsibilities


	Support the production team in daily operations
	Assist in setting up equipment and other production materials
	Monitor production timelines to ensure orders are completed on schedule.
	Assist in packaging and labelling


Requirements


	Bsc / OND qualification.
	2 years relevant work experience
	Candidate must reside in or around Gbagada
	Excellent communication and teamwork skill
	Detail-oriented with excellent time management and organizational abilities.
	Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
